A classic in storytelling, puzzles and environment building. You owe it to yourself to see how Valve made a name for themselves.

Recommended.

9.5/10

La suite de Portal est juste parfait il se finit en moins de 10H et le mode co-op se finit en 6h
mais surtout ACHETEZ LE il a temps de vie égal a 200H avec le steam workshop!
si un ami le possède le fun est double!
parfait pour passer ses aprems quand vous ne savez pas quoi faire!
muy bueno el juego te da una gran tristesa al cabar el final  :''v
Den Einzelspieler mag ich nicht so aber der Mehrspieler Modus ist hammer lustig :D (ich werde abgebaut)
Genuinly amazing. A must play indeed.
玩了一晚上，贼鸡儿好玩～～～
it's awesome

I had loads of fun with the multiplayer in this game. So much so that I still haven't finished the single player campaign.

2+2 = 4
4-2 = 2    2 - 2 + 1 = 1    0 + 1 = 1
12 months in a year
the 2nd test chamber is 5x5x5 room 5- 5 -5 + 2 =-3     -3 +2 =-1    -1+2 = 1 + 1 = 2
M's number is 12    12 years passed when you start Portal 2.. I think.  12 - 12 = 0 + 1 = 1 = 1 = 2    12 -3 = 9 HL2 prise is 9.99 12 - 9 = 3     HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRMED now gimme fucking ADS I spent years doing this problem.

Buen juego, no sólo lo digo por que lo haya haya hecho Valve si no por su experiencia de juego, gráficos, historia, los gráficos, etc. El modo cooperativo también es uno de esos elementos que forman parte del juego y significa que puedes jugar online con tus amigos/as. Si vas a comprar un juego para tu cuenta  de Steam, Portal 2 no te lo puedes perder :) (no olvides jugar primero Portal)

As I said in my review for portal 1, the portal series is one of my top favorite game series because of its creativity and wit. Portal 2 only helps to add and improve upon on the solid foundation that portal 1 set with a bigger story and new game mechanics. Not only does it have an excelent story mode, but the multiplayer levels are just as smoothly designed and full of just as much creativity and humor.
I don't have to say much here. All the other reviews speak for themselves. This game is a masterpiece.

Portal 2 is my favourite game of all time. The dailogue is amazing and I love the two main characters (Wheatly and GLADOS)
and the puzzles are well made.
Это отличная игра, я залипал на тестовых камерах.
Best fucking game ever. Portal 2 is a game that needs no introduction, but If you somehow haven't tried it yet, [u][b]play it right now![/b][/u]. It's called a [u][b]masterpiece[/b] [/u]for a reason.

Bu oyun varya bu oyun neden seni daha önce oynamadım diye kafamı duvarlara vurduğum bir oyun.Arkadaşlar oynayın oynattır herkes bu oynasın MÜKEMMEL diyorum hikayesi,bulmacası,espirisi,müzikleri,ortam havası,oynanış,harita tasarım ve detaylar 100 ÜZERİNDEN 100 harikaaaaa oynamayanın kafasına orbit atılacak bir oyun bu oyunu oynamayan kendine oyuncu demesin ! ve son olarak daha önce hiç bir portal oyunu oynamadıysanız ilk olarak Portal sonra bu yani Portal 2 ve son olarak Portal Stories Mel oyunu oynayınız indirimlerde oyun sakız fiyatına kadar düşüyor ki böyle bir oyun bu kadar düşük fiyatı haketmiyor neyse seri şeklinde oynayın direk 2. oyundan başlamayın portal 1 de harika bir oyun bütün bu yazdıklarım portal 1 içinde geçerli yani İlk portal 1 sonra portal 2 oynayın

good
It is a really great game. I love it so much such a great puzzle game

Mükemmel.. Fiyatını fazlasıyla hak eden; single modu ayrı, co-op modu ayrı tat veren bir Valve "şaheseri". Senaryosu ilk oyunuyla bağlantılı ve kanımca daha başarılı. Oynadıkça, bulmacaları çözdükçe oyuna daha da sarıp başından kalkamadım. Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.. Benden tam puan aldı. 10/10!

buy it now. I can't stress how amazing this game is. go uninstall fortnite, and/or pubG, CS:GO, all of those "popular" games, and install portal 2. then proceed to binge the half life series, and... did i mention, you should play portal first? well, okay. go play that, then do the above.

also, replayability in the form of community chambers: i completed the main game in only 5 hours, but the rest of my (relatively small amount of) hours were spent on community tests.
Couldnt get into it at all. Tried 3 times. Graphicaly aged terribly, Lacking fun factor, lackin story, just meh..
Portal 2 is a pretty cool game. Eh challenges your mind and doesn't afraid of anything.
Such a classic! Still my favorite game of all time!

This game is hours of fun.  I purchased this game for myself and then for my son (age 8).  Its been great playing in co-op mode and seeing how he reasons and things about how to solve the puzzle.

Portal 2...Bence Valve'ın doruk noktası. Öncelikle, Portal 2 bir puzzle oyunu değildir, bir şaheserdir.Oyunun hikayesi, bulmacaları, co-op görevleri ve topluluk haritalarında geçen zamanı anlamıyorsunuz. Oyunun hikayesi ise gerçekten merak ettiriyor, çoğu oyundan daha iyi. Bulmacalar ise sizi sıkmadan zorlamayı başarıyor. Oyun artık o kadar yer etmiştir ki bende, hatırladıkça duygulanırım, müzekleri en sevdiğim müziklerdendir. Ah GlaDOS, biz hiç gitmek istemiyorduk ki!
Ruim!
Лучшая в мире интерактивная головоломка. Я просто обожаю эту игру!

Ein sehr gelungener Nachfolger des ersten Teils! Der erste Teil hat mir schon sehr gefallen... Doch dieser Teil ist einfach unschlagbar! Es ist eins der besten Spiele auf ganz Steam! Das Valve-Team hat sich sehr viel Mühe beim Bearbeiten des Spiels mit der Source-Engine gegeben. Die Witze wie "Guck da! Der Reh, den ich draußen gesehen hatte!" oder Wheatley allgemein sind auch nur witzig! Über die Geschichte werde ich jetzt nichts spoilern, aber sie lässt vieles aus dem ersten Teil einen Sinn bekommen. Und ich wünsche mir wirklich, dass es bald auch Portal 3 geben wird, obwohl der Geschichtenschreiber von Portal 1 und 2 glaube ich nicht mehr bei Valve arbeitet...
Portal to bardzo przyjemna gra. Bardzo fajnie mi się przechodizlło gre (chociaż nieraz było trudno). Według mnie najlepszy jest tryb kooperacji. Ocena końcowa 10/10. :)

Uma continuação perfeita do primeiro jogo contando ainda mais da historia de todo esse universo e de como o mundo se comportou em todos esse anos.
Com uma fisica retrabalhada e melhorada e com gráficos ainda mais incrível que o primeiro, Portal 2 superou as expectativas criadas e contou um estilo de historia que a Valve ainda não havia contado.
Acho que nem preciso dizer que a Gladus leva esse jogo na costa fácil fácil, mais agora temos um novo amigo Wheatley, sempre com você para fazer boa piada no tempo certo quando você precisar.
Em resumo é um jogo majestoso com uma historia perfeita jogabilidade incrivel, que você pode comprar sem medo, afinal seu companheiro Companion cube esta esperando.

es un digna secuela de portal  mejora en todo tanto  mecanica y narrativamente
Awesome puzzles, incredibly entertaining, I had to get it on my xbox as well i enjoyed it so much.

Действия игры происходят в лаборатории Aperture Science. После событий первого Portal, чел просыпается у себя в комнате, диктор ей говорит что делать что бы поддержиать состояние нормальности, и она ложится спать. Вот когда она просыпается 2 раз, начинается лютый пи***дец. Всему комплексу пи*** ибо Галька спит крепким сном... 

Ну вобщем дальше не буду спойлерить, рекомендую! Есть тут так же кооператив, так что с друзьями весело будет.
Great game, interesting new parts to expand over Portal 1. A little frustrating sometimes where it becomes a tedious task of finding walls you can use your portal gun on.

10/10 A puzzle game that everyone should play through at least once.

Portal 2 реально хорошая игра, ну по моему мнению. Продолжение сюжета первой части, а кто адаптировал игру на русский язык молодцы, реально постарались.Чувство одиночества из первой части больше нет, также нам рассказали больше про Чел и Глэдос, а Уитли вообще тащит на себе всё начало игры. Про мультиплеер молчу, он идеален. Valve сделали реально годную игру.

Even better than the first.
One of my favourite games of all time.

ПЛЮСЫ:
Сюжет, юмор, увлекательный геймплей, много разнообразных уровней, хорошая графика, отличная идея игры, мультиплеер.
МИНУСЫ:
Второй раз игру не многий захочет пройти
Игра оставила во мне хорошее впечатление, во первых самим геймплеем, многие игры сейчас стали называть "Мыльным кинцом", о Portal 2 такого не скажешь, так как геймплей главная фишка игры. В игре помимо геймлея присутствует довольно неплохой сюжет, а также юмор, как обычный, так и черный. Меня порадовала графика. Вроде бы в игре нет никаких красивых пейзажей и тому подобного, а графика довольна хороша и вгоняет в атмосферу игры.
Так что 10/10
is good game

Portal 2 est un classique du jeu vidéo et il y a des raisons. Même si vous n'aimez pas les puzzle games, allez y, parce que Portal 2 c'est bien plus que ça.
Je vais juste me contenter de lister les + et les - selon mon opinion car je pense qu'il y a déjà bien assez de trucs très bien écrits sur ce jeu.

Les + :
Le concept (les portails, le sujet de test, GLaDoS... j'aime)
Le level design (niveaux très variés, inventifs et qui se renouvèlent beaucoup)
L'histoire (prenante, avec des plot twists que je n'ai pas vu venir, et plein de détails partout, je conseille la BD aussi)
Les personnages (attachants et très humains pour des robots)
Le sound design (très propre, les voix françaises sont excellentes, le doublage au poil et la traduction n'a pas à rougir)
Les checkpoints (réguliers, ce qui rend les morts pas trop punitives)
Un 2e jeu compris avec la co-op (niveaux 100% différents, pensé pour le jeu à 2 et augmente considérablement la durée de vie)
Marrant (j'ai vraiment explosé de rire à certains moments, même si c'était des phases très importantes ingame (no spoil !))
Le jeu ne coûte presque rien en soldes
Les vidéos en extra sont sympa et apportent des trucs au lore
Un mode challenge/replay/scoring pas trop mal fait

Les - :
Un peu de motion sickness à certains moments pour ma part
Quelques bugs (dialogues qui ne se lancent pas, bruits bizarres, quelques softlocks)
Parfois frustrant si on est idiot (je suis resté bloqué un peu trop longtemps sur certains tests)

Bref, jouez à Portal 2.

"Oh how we laught and laught
Exept I wasn't laughing"
